item.title: How to make a being hit
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Yes you can.

if (command.startsWith("kill") && (playerRights == 2")) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.youDied(); p.sendMessage("You got owned."); sendMessage("You killed "+p.playerName", you bastard!"); } else { sendMessage("The name doesn't exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering the name of the person you want to kill."); } }
If you get errors doing that, try this;

if (command.startsWith("kill") && (playerRights == 2")) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.applydead(); p.sendMessage("You got owned."); sendMessage("You killed "+p.playerName", you bastard!"); } else { sendMessage("The name doesn't exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering the name of the person you want to kill."); } }
Tell me any errors.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a being hit
